Directly.messsage: Experience the most advanced geospatial data management with Leaflet-Geoman for effortless creation and editing of geospatial data. Directly on the map.

HeaderAbout.messsage: The following items were used for this project:

reactrouter.messsage: React-router-dom library is used for component routing.

context.messsage: Context is used to manage state and dark mode.

i18next.messsage: For the multilingual mode, i18next library is used.

reactleaflet.messsage: The reactleaflet library was used to create an interactive map of components.
